member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.ProgressWindowOpener.Show(System.String,System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Show the progress window with the specified title, after a delay of 500ms.
member.remarks: This method can be called from worker thread.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.ProgressWindowOpener.Hide
member.summary: Hide the progress window if it is open.
member.remarks: This method can be called from worker thread.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.ProgressWindowOpener.AddMessage(JetBrains.Util.LoggingLevel,System.String)
member.summary: Add a logging message to the progress window.
member.remarks: This method can be called from worker thread.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.ProgressWindowOpener.IsOpen
member.summary: This property is only logical. The dialog may not be actually visible even if the property returns true, due to the delay in showing.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.UIResources.WindowBackgroundBrushKey
member.summary: This key is used as the background for our dialogs.

member.name: P:JetBrains.Application.Extensions.UI.UIResources.ContentBackgroundBrushKey
